Title: Spenser Confidential
Genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Thriller
Writer: Sean O'Keefe (screenplay by), Brian Helgeland (screenplay by), Robert B. Parker (characters), Ace Atkins (novel)
Actors: Mark Wahlberg, Winston Duke, Alan Arkin, Iliza Shlesinger
Plot: When two Boston police officers are murdered, ex-cop Spenser teams up with his no-nonsense roommate, Hawk, to take down criminals.
